chat.title: AI Support Assistant
chat.description: Get instant answers to your VPS questions. Our AI can help with plan recommendations, setup guidance, and technical support.
chat.welcome:
Hello! I'm PCloud's virtual assistant. I can help you with:
- VPS plan recommendations
- Service inquiries
- Technical support

How can I assist you?
chat.error_technical: Sorry, we are experiencing technical issues. Please try again later or contact our support team.
chat.error_service: An error occurred with our PCloud chatbot service. Please try again or contact our support team.

ticket.title: Submit Support Ticket
ticket.description: Need personalized help? Submit a ticket and our expert support team will respond within 2 hours.
ticket.success_message: Your support ticket has been submitted successfully! We'll respond via email within 2 hours.
ticket.track_in: You can track your ticket status in
ticket.subject: Subject
ticket.description_placeholder: Please provide detailed information about your issue, including any error messages, steps to reproduce, and what you've already tried...

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our VPS hosting services.
faq.cant_find: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

q1.question: What VPS plan should I choose?
q1.answer: Choose based on your needs: Starter for small websites, Business for growing applications, Professional for high-traffic sites, and Enterprise for resource-intensive applications.

q2.question: How long does VPS deployment take?
q2.answer: Most VPS instances are deployed within 5-10 minutes after successful payment confirmation. You will receive setup details via email.

q3.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
q3.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan anytime from your dashboard. Downgrades are processed at the end of your billing cycle.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept MoMo wallet and VNPay (credit/debit cards). All payments are processed securely.

q5.question: Do you provide backup services?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer automated daily backups for all VPS plans. You can also create manual backups from your control panel.

q6.question: What level of support do you provide?
q6.answer: We provide 24/7 technical support via live chat, email, and phone. Our expert team can help with server configuration, troubleshooting, and optimization.

footer.description: PCloud provides reliable and affordable VPS hosting solutions with 99.9% uptime guarantee, high-performance SSD/NVMe storage, and dedicated 24/7 expert support. Perfect for websites, applications, and growing businesses that need scalable cloud infrastructure with full control.
footer.24_7_desc: Our technical support team is available around the clock to help you.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy_policy.introduction: PCloud ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our VPS hosting services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

items.account: Account information: name, email address, phone number, and billing address when you register for our services
items.payment: Payment information: credit card details, transaction history, and billing records processed through secure payment gateways (VNPay, MoMo)
items.usage: Usage data: VPS resource consumption, login times, service configurations, and support ticket history
items.technical: Technical data: IP addresses, server logs, browser type, and device information for security and service optimization

items.service: Providing and maintaining VPS hosting services, including server deployment, monitoring, and technical support
items.communication: Sending service notifications, billing reminders, maintenance alerts, and responding to your inquiries
items.improvement: Analyzing usage patterns to improve our infrastructure, optimize performance, and develop new features
items.security: Detecting and preventing fraud, abuse, security threats, and ensuring compliance with our terms of service

items.encryption: All data transmissions are encrypted using industry-standard TLS/SSL protocols
items.access: Strict access controls limit employee access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
items.monitoring: 24/7 security monitoring and intrusion detection systems protect our infrastructure
items.backup: Regular encrypted backups ensure data recovery in case of system failures

items.access: Access and review your personal information stored in our systems at any time through your account dashboard
items.correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data by contacting our support team
items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal retention requirements and active service obligations
items.export: Export your data in a portable format for transfer to another service provider

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.description: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. After account termination, we may retain certain data for up to 90 days for backup purposes. Financial records are retained for 7 years as required by law.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact our privacy team:

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our VPS hosting services.
terms_of_service.notice: By using PCloud services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms_of_service.introduction: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of PCloud's virtual private server (VPS) hosting services. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and PCloud. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, with notice provided through email or our website.

items.vps: Virtual Private Server hosting with dedicated CPU, RAM, and storage resources as specified in your selected plan
items.support: 24/7 technical support via live chat, email, and phone for service-related issues
items.uptime: 99.9% uptime guarantee backed by our Service Level Agreement (SLA)
items.backup: Snapshot functionality for creating and restoring VPS backups through the control panel

items.billing: Services are billed monthly in advance. Your billing cycle begins on the date of service activation
items.methods: We accept payments via VNPay (credit/debit cards) and MoMo wallet. All payments are processed securely
items.refund: Refunds are available within 7 days of initial purchase if the service does not meet advertised specifications
items.late: Late payments may result in service suspension after 24 hours past due date

items.uptime: We guarantee 99.9% network and infrastructure uptime, measured monthly
items.credit: For each hour of downtime below 99.9%, you receive 5% service credit (maximum 100% monthly fee)
items.maintenance: Scheduled maintenance windows are announced 48 hours in advance and do not count toward downtime
items.exclusions: SLA excludes downtime caused by DDoS attacks, user actions, or force majeure events

items.illegal: Any illegal activities including but not limited to fraud, hacking, or distribution of illegal content
items.spam: Sending unsolicited bulk emails (spam), phishing attempts, or email harvesting
items.malware: Hosting or distributing malware, viruses, botnets, or participating in DDoS attacks
items.abuse: Resource abuse that affects other users, including cryptocurrency mining without prior approval

items.user: You may cancel your service at any time through your account dashboard. No refunds for partial months
items.provider: We may terminate service immediately for Terms violations, with or without notice
items.suspension: Services may be suspended for payment issues, abuse reports, or during security investigations
items.data: Upon termination, your data will be retained for 24 hours, after which it will be permanently deleted

items.limitation: Our maximum liability is limited to the fees paid by you in the 3 months preceding the incident
items.indirect: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages including lost profits or data
items.force: We are not responsible for service interruptions due to events beyond our reasonable control
items.third: We are not liable for actions of third parties or content hosted on your VPS

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be notified via email at least 30 days before taking effect. Continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team:

cookies_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookies_policy.subtitle: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website.

what_are_cookies.title: What Are Cookies?
what_are_cookies.description: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, keep you logged in, and understand how you use the site. We use cookies to provide a better, faster, and safer experience on PCloud.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core features like secure login, session management, and security protection. Without these cookies, certain services cannot be provided.

examples.session: Session cookies to maintain your login state
examples.auth: Authentication tokens for secure API access
examples.security: CSRF tokens to prevent cross-site request forgery

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website. We use this data to improve our services, identify issues, and optimize user experience. All analytics data is anonymized.

examples.usage: Page view tracking to understand popular features
examples.performance: Performance metrics to optimize load times
examples.errors: Error tracking to identify and fix issues

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies remember your settings and preferences to provide a personalized experience. They help us remember your language, theme, and display preferences across sessions.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.description: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your user experience.

items.browser: Browser settings: Most browsers allow you to view, manage, and delete cookies in settings
items.disable: Disable optional cookies: You can continue using our services with only essential cookies enabled
items.delete: Clear cookies: You can delete all cookies at any time, but you will need to log in again

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

pending_verification.note_text: The verification link will expire in 24 hours. If expired, you'll need to request a new one.

toast.resend_success_desc: Check your inbox for the new verification link

validation.fill_all_fields: Please fill in all required fields
validation.invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or navigate back to the homepage.
notFound.whyTitle: Why am I seeing this page?
reasons: The page you're looking for doesn't exist
The page has been moved or deleted
You might not have permission to access this page

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.subtitle: You do not have permission to access this page or resource. Please log in with the appropriate account or contact support if you believe this is an error.
forbidden.whyTitle: Why am I seeing this page?
reasons: Your account does not have the necessary permissions
The resource is restricted to certain users
You might be trying to access an admin-only area

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.subtitle: We apologize, but an unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
reasons: Refresh the page and try again
Clear your browser cache and cookies
Contact support if the problem persists
